cannotApprove: The referral can not be approved in the current state
cannotDelete: You can only delete the shipments that are pending delivery
cannotReject: The referral can not be rejected in the current state
cannotSendToDaf: Can not send to the DAF in the current state of the referral
descriptionRequired: The description of the detail is required
detailsRequired: You must include at least one detail
needExcelToSend: The attachment must be attached in excel format before being sent to the DAF
needPdfToApprove: You need to attach the remittance in pdf format before being approved
notFounds: No shipments were found with the selected search parameters.
quantityRequired: The amount of detail is required
sentToDaf: I send correctly to the DAF
requestAnnulmentSent: The request for cancellation of referrals was sent successfully
